column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This is a super happening place that delivered on fun environment
column2: great food and terrific service. We had Marilyn as our server and she was a delight
column3: especially as she coached us through the extensive menu since we were newbies. We will be back for sure. Loved all of the tapas we tried...don't miss the goat cheese in tomato sauce
column5: the steak with blue cheese...oh and the empanadas. I mean
column6: the whole experience was terrific. We will be back again - we are out of towners who visit our son at school.
